body.p: i thought i must write A few lines although i am very tired indeed it is evening no one home but Edd and hattie and me martha has been gone to philadelphe Philadelphia most a week Jeff came home last night but mat dident didn't come they were to come tuesday or wensday Wednesday sure i dont don't think they will come such a game over me again she has no girl and the work has been very hard on me davis s cousin has been here come the same night they went and staid stayed till monday Monday then he came again last night but Jeff helped me get breakfast this morning i hope mat will come to morrow tomorrow they think its all nothing i dont don't even get thanked i have been left so much alone here this winter they leave me a whissel whistle to blow three times if any body anybody comes to break in davis says the watchmen will come over if i blow three times i told him i should be more afraid of the watchmen than i should of the burglars i dont don't suppose there is any danger but it is very dreary up here in cold winter nights i am most afraid of fire but it will be spring one of these days i hope) its it's very cold here to night tonight hattee is setting sitting one side of me and Edd the other Jeff and davis has gone away to be out very late)

i forgot to tell you when i wrote last Emma price had been here i got her dinner and last sunday Sunday she was here to tea and she came again on monday Monday she brought me a lot of oranges her mother is very well and been to the theater George was up to day he seldom misses without it storms
very bad he is well looks real fat he is in hopes they can sell one of the other houses

i see walt by your letter mr Heyde has not forgotten you i too have had a short epistle from him but mine was quite moderate he says he sent me a long letter this last winter but he dident didn't direct it right so he thinks i dident didn't get it but i did it was very long it treated mostly about a rabbitt rabbit in the wood house i must write to han as soon as i can my arm keeps lame yet it gets up my arm more i got your letter yesterday walt with the money all safe if you can walt just as well as not in about two weeks send me ten dollars i have bought a barrel of flour and am to pay him five dollars and he is to wait two weeks for the ten so walt if you can send it by that time i would be glad) there was something i wanted to tell you i thought off of to day today but i cant can't think what it is nothin nothing of great importance or i could think of it we have got a lot of little chickens was haching hatching when they went away so we had to fetch them in some died hattie buried one after she covered it up she asked me if i thought it would go to heaven hattie is a very smart child if she had the right tutoring i doo do hope when mat comes home she will settle down they have went it this winter if they never did before walt i think when you read this you l you'll say mother is getting childish i think very like she is
